title: 道德經
source: Chinese Text Project (ctext.org) - James Legge translation

passages.en: (The completion of material forms) The valley spirit dies not, aye the same; the female mystery thus do we name.
Its gate, from which at first they issued forth, is called the root from which grew heaven and earth.
Long and unbroken does its power remain, used gently, and without the touch of pain.
